It was brought to our attention by a couple of different individuals that a student was at school with marijuana. Due to this information, we found it necessary to have the Ness County Sheriffs office come and investigate. They brought the K9 units from Gove and Hodgeman County to do a search of the buildings. Due to the search of the building, NCHS was on lockdown for about 45 minutes today.

Through the investigation marijuana was found and the individual(s) is being dealt with according to district policy. We have concluded the searches and the school day has resumed, however this investigation is ongoing.

There was no danger to any of the students or staff here at the Jr/Sr High School. I ask that you please take this as an opportunity to talk with your student(s) about drug use.

Due to this being a student matter, I ask that you refrain from calling with questions. I am not at liberty to discuss the situation.

post_text: Our High School students have recently finished their second Tiny Home and it is ready for delivery. This home features two lofts, kitchen, bathroom, and living space. The home is 192 ground floor sq feet (24 foot by 8 foot). Bathroom has a 36 inch shower. The trailer was manufactured by Trailermade. The home features steel framing to reduce weight, and increase R-Value of insulation. The home is fully spray foamed insulated, including the floor (closed cell-foam). Custom Hickory trim, Hickory cabinets, and custom concrete counter tops makes this a top of the line custom Tiny House. The home has a mini-split ductless heating and cooling unit for those hot days and cold nights. Price is negotiable, all funds from the home will be used to continue to provide outstanding learning opportunities in the Trades for our students.

post_text: Beginning, Saturday, September 23, USD 303 will be making needed repairs to the High School Track. We will be working to fill the many cracks, and patch in spots where the rubber has worn off. This process will take several weekends of work to finish. During this time, we will be locking up access to the track to give the substances used time to properly dry. We apologize for any inconvenience this will cause to our patrons that use the track on a regular basis.

post_text: As we work on our School Accreditation and Improvement plan, one area that we would like to improve is community and parent involvement in the direction the school is going.
